text: @MSNBC No kidding, #Trump distracting us from his #FailureInChief. Policies regarding #coronavirus #pandemic. It's been his way from the day he announced his candidacy. #VoteBlue2020 #TrumpVirus #COVID #TrumpLiesPeopleDie #COVIDIOT #HealthcareHeroes #WeAreInThisTogether #TrumpMeltdown
